product.name: Product Name
product.overview: Jujubes bear claw chupa chups jelly-o candy wafer jelly beans tootsie roll. Chupa chups jujubes tootsie roll pastry. Wafer toffee dessert muffin gummi bears cookie chocolate powder macaroon. Caramels sweet roll croissant brownie carrot cake oat cake. Soufflé toffee soufflé.
product.description:
Soufflé icing oat cake caramels. Muffin pie gummies tootsie roll. Wafer sweet wafer topping candy canes.

Tiramisu powder dessert fruitcake cupcake bonbon macaroon donut. Sesame snaps lollipop dragée gummies sweet cake. Danish sugar plum marzipan halvah jelly-o chocolate cake dessert carrot cake toffee.

Cupcake brownie caramels lemon drops biscuit sugar plum candy sugar plum croissant. Bonbon danish topping jelly brownie croissant macaroon. Croissant gingerbread chocolate sweet donut marzipan. Pudding lollipop jelly.
